Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Describes the current state of the Game. Stores the name of the Game, the number of players, references to its Players, Board and Deck, the active God Power Cards in a turn, the number of the turn player and an eventual winner.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<Card> activeModifiers
    List of Cards with a modifier that's currently active.

    The Game Board.
    private Deck deck
    The Deck containing all God Cards.
    private java.lang.String name
    The name of the Game.
    private int playerNum
    The Game's player number (2 or 3).
    private java.util.ArrayList<Player> players
    List of Players who joined the Game.
    private Player winner
    The Player who eventually won.

    • Game

      public Game​(java.lang.String name, Player p1, int num)
      Game constructor. Prepares a new Game, setting all the attributes to their default or actual values.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Game
      p1 - the player who first enters the Game
      num - the number of players

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the players of the Game

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(Player player) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a player to the current Game.
      Parameters:
      player - the new Player
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - when trying to add more players than allowed for the current Game
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when trying to add a player who already joined the current Game

    • getPlayerNum

      public int getPlayerNum()
      Returns:
      the number of players in the current Game

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Returns:
      the Board of the current Game

    • getDeck

      public Deck getDeck()

      public void setActivePlayer​(int i)
      Sets the number of the active players.
      Parameters:
      i - the number to set

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      Updates the activePlayer counter. It takes a value between 0 and 1 in a two-players game, and among 0, 1 or 2 in a three-players game.

    • getActiveModifiers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getActiveModifiers()
      Returns:
      all the active Modifiers of the Game

    • addModifier

      public void addModifier​(Card modifier)
      Adds the Card received as an argument to the list of the active Modifiers.
      Parameters:
      modifier - the God Card to add

    • removeModifier

      public void removeModifier​(Card modifier)
      Removes the Card received as an argument from the list of the active Modifiers.
      Parameters:
      modifier - the God Card to remove

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      Returns:
      the winner of the current Game

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner​(Player winner)
      Sets the Player received as an argument as the winner of the current Game.
      Parameters:
      winner - the Player to set as the winner

    • hasWinner

      public boolean hasWinner()
      Returns:
      true if the current Game has a winner, false otherwise
